resources.string: Thanks for downloading Bouira Computer Science version 2.0. This version is more better than the previous one, please swipe left to continue!
A small platform to access to lessons, TDs, TPs, Exams and more with just one click.
To protect this app from spam and abuse, you need an account. If you don\'t have one already, you can create one.
Our app supports offline pdf save.You just need to download the pdf once and keep it forever. Click the start button to start the app.
If you don\'t have an account, just create one
Please double check your internet connection then try again
Create an account with singel click

It\'s an open source android app project, which made to help computer sciences students in this university to access courses, TDs, TPs, Exams... in organised way and without internet connecton.\nPlease note that you need to download the PDF only for the first time.

As i said, it's an open source project so, you can do the following things :
1 - You can get the source code from the link below.
2 - If you are learning android developement, you can use the source code to learn how things works in this app.
3 - You can try to improve the app and contact me for your improvements at fares.mdh1@gmail.com.
Open source libraries used in this app

This app use some open source libraries :
1 - Android 12 splash screen API : androidx.core:core-splashscreen:1.0.1
2 - Lottie animations player :
com.airbnb.android:lottie:6.3.0
3 - Google Gson library : 
com.google.code.gson:gson:2.10.1
4 - Glide image loader : 
com.github.bumptech.glide:glide:4.16.0
5 - PDF Viewer library : com.github.iamyashchouhan:AndroidPdfViewer:1.0.3
6 - Liquid Swipe : 
com.github.Chrisvin:LiquidSwipe:1.0.0

This app was made with Android Studio IDE.
XML Language for user interface (UI)
KOTLIN Language as a programing language
Supabase as database
Supabase sdk for Kotlin

Hi, i\'m MEDDAHI Fares, a computer sciences student at Bouira university and Android apps developer.\nI\'m happy to share with you this simple project. For any question or details don\'t hesitate to contact me at one of my social media :
We will show modules and documents relative to your level. You can change your level later!
